todaysAdvice.text: You have low levels of serotonin today; I would recommend slowing down and taking it easy today, or to go out with a friend

It is a good day on Stoke-On-Trent and exercise is proved to boost ones immune system and mental health. I would recommend a 15 minutes jog around your favvourite spot since your body is at its peak today!
Your sugar levels are low today. Treat yourself to some ice cream after all your hard work!
It seems like your body is undergoing a lot of stress. Remember to take a deep breath and meditate if you feel stressed
I have detected an anomaly on your blood stream. I would recommend to get a blood test at your nearest clinic or G. P.
